report.title: Osiris tabular other - level 1
report.description: Tabular output for Osiris level 1 other classifications for a sample.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select t_l1.id as "id", t_l1.id as "term_id", t_l1.term as "term", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "speciescount", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id and avsub.int_value=t_l1.id ) as "rep", sqi.sqi, nullif(count(distinct case when ttd.taxon_id is null then null else ttl.taxon_meaning_id end), 0) as "cons_count", string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons", av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id as "trait_attr_id" from cache_termlists_terms t_l1 join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l1 on av_l1.int_value=t_l1.id and av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#other_classification_attr_ids#) and av_l1.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=cttl.id left join ( select av_l11.int_value as l1_id, round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) as sqi from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l11 on av_l11.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_l11.deleted=false and av_l11.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#other_classification_attr_ids#) join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# #joins# group by av_l11.int_value ) as sqi on sqi.l1_id=av_l1.int_value left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms cat on cat.id=td.category_id and ( (cat.term='GB Red List' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'NA', 'pLC', 'pNA', 'NE')) or (cat.term='GB Status' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('None', 'Not reviewed', 'Not native')) or (cat.term not in ('GB Red List', 'GB Status')) ) ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false where av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#other_classification_attr_ids#) and t_l1.parent_id is null group by t_l1.id, t_l1.id, t_l1.term, sqi.sqi, av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id ) as sub

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id in (#website_ids#) and o.survey_id=(select survey_id from samples where id=#sample_id#) and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
